annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am taking a look at the “Orange Whip” from The Blues Brothers. In the movie, the Orange Whip makes its appearance after it...
annotations.title: The Blues Brothers "Orange Whip" | How to Drink

textContent:
- 4 oz or 120 ml Fresh Orange Juice
- 1 oz or 30 ml Rum
- 1 oz or 30 ml Vodka
- .5 oz or 15 ml Triple Sec
- 2 oz or 60 ml Heavy Cream
- Shake Over Crushed Ice
- Garnish with Orange Wheel

Shake and open pour into collins glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ca7UoDT5TKo9
title: Orange Whip
